title: Civita di Artena
description: The remains of an ancient fortified center close to the town of Artena, Italy. The original settlement, of uncertain name, may have been established by the Volsci; both Ecetra and Fortinum have been suggested. The modern village was known as Monte Fortino until 1873.

properties.description: The remains of an ancient fortified center close to the town of Artena
